title: Average ticket price Boston Celtics ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: In general Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2006/07 to 2008/09, and finally roughly constant from 2008/09 to 2011/12.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2006/07 and 2007/08.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 68.55 was reached at Year 2008/09,  2009/10,  2010/11, and 2011/12
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 57.04 was reported at Year 2006/07
